org.ldaptive.auth

Class AuthorizationIdentityEntryResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ldaptive.auth.AbstractSearchOperationFactory
      • org.ldaptive.auth.AbstractSearchEntryResolver
        • org.ldaptive.auth.AuthorizationIdentityEntryResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntryResolver

    public class AuthorizationIdentityEntryResolver
extends AbstractSearchEntryResolver
    Reads the authorization identity response control, then performs an object level search on the result. Useful when users authenticate with some mapped identifier, like DIGEST-MD5. This resolver must be used with an AuthenticationHandler that is configured to send the AuthorizationIdentityRequestControl.
